## Trove.adjust() method

Calculate the result of an [adjustTrove()](./lib-base.transactableliquity.adjusttrove.md) transaction on this Trove.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjust(params: any, borrowingRate: any): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | any | Parameters of the transaction. |
|  borrowingRate | any | Borrowing rate to use when adding to the Trove's debt. |

<b>Returns:</b>

any
